title: GitHub
content:
Create a new repository
```
git init
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/unifino/project_002.git
```
```
git push -u origin main
```

<hr>

Push an existing repository
```
git remote add origin https://github.com/unifino/project_002.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
```

<hr>

```
git config --global --edit

```

<hr>


Undo Commit:
```
git reset --hard xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
git push --force
```

<hr>
